content: row knitted repeat these 24 row another six times changing the contrast colour each time you should have 7 contrast colour and 8 main colour stripes large size using mc cast on 182 stitches row 1 rs k1 *k9 k2tog k8 kfb* repeat from * to * 8 more times k1 row 2 ws sl1p with yarn in front *k9 k2tog k8 kfb* repeat from * to * 8 more times yarn forward sl1p repeat row 1 and 2 four more times 10 row knitted change to cc1 and repeat row 1 and 2 eleven times 22 row knitted change to mc and repeat row 1 and 2 five times 10 row knitted repeat these 32 row another eight times changing the contrast colour each time you should have 9 contrast colour and 10 main colour stripes cast off weave in ends and block to size © catherine anderson designs garter chevron blanket v2 3
